A flexible, animated popup/notification library for Angular applications with multiple themes and animation options.

- ğŸ¨ Multiple pre-built themes (success, warning, error, etc.)
- âœ¨ Custom animations (slide, fade, cubic bezier)
- â± Auto-dismiss after timeout
- ğŸ›  Programmatic control via service
- ğŸ“¦ Lightweight and tree-shakable

npm install ap-popup
